review: Don't know how I've lived this long without it, quick service.
author: Susan  Pierson

review: Great product! I have had it for a couple months now and I have had no issues whatsoever.If your HDMI port is on the back of the tv, I HIGHLY RECCOMEND you purchase an L shaped (90 degree) adapter.
author: nerdstatuss1124

review: Product works well and it is fairly reliable.  The only problem I have with it is the delayed response when using the remote; it takes a few presses of any button to see any reaction on-screen.  Otherwise, every application included works as advertised and I have yet to experience any failures.
author: Ricardo Rodriguez

review: I like the tons of channels available from this stick. Would give it a 5 star if upgrade is available to speed up the response.
author: bong

review: It worked great for 6 months & suddenly stopped connecting to internet. Called Roku and was advised I would be charged $9.99 to speak to tech after holding for 15 min. I've done every version of resets except under settings on the Roku menu because I CAN'T ACCESS IT so I'm trying unplugging the entire thing for hours to see if that does anything. Good luck if you purchase one.
author: S. C. Drinkard

review: 5 days were needed for their customer support to get ROKU working.  Then it quit after 2 more days.  Then I paid a local tech guy to get it working again.  Then it quit again.  I give up.  Buying something else instead.
author: William
